sqlMap.select: SELECT numgio FROM catsca WHERE tiplav=#tipoAppalto# AND liminf<=#importoGara# AND (limsup>#importoGara# OR limsup = #numNonDefinito#) AND calcolo=#tipoCalcolo# AND (tipgar=#tipoProcedura# or tipgar=#numNonDefinito#) AND (prourg=#proceduraUrgente# or prourg=#strNonDefinita#) AND (terrid=#termineRidotto# or terrid=#strNonDefinita#) AND (banweb=#bandoWeb# or banweb=#strNonDefinita#) AND (docweb=#docWeb# or docweb=#strNonDefinita#) AND (oggcont=#oggettoContratto# or oggcont=#numNonDefinito#)
